articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Apple’s executive shake-up continues with departures of general counsel and policy head - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple loses two more top senior executives with exits of longtime general counsel Kate Adams and environmental VP Lisa Jackson. Meta’s Jennifer Newstead is set to join as new general counsel in 2026.
articles.content: Apple’s executive shake-up continues. Days after announcing AI chief John Giannandrea’s departure, and the loss of design exec Alan Dye to Meta, the iPhone maker shared the news of two more exec reti… [+3413 chars]
